rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a reception desk, integrated into the brutalist aesthetic using raw concrete finishes.
Large open space with exposed structural elements. Minimalistic design complemented by large windows for natural light and ventilation.
Adjacent to the kitchen; designed for family gatherings; features a concrete countertop island.
Multi-purpose area offering space for leisure activities and work, with built-in shelves for storage.
Located at the rear of the house ensuring privacy; designed with a Vastu-compliant orientation to enhance relaxation and energy flow.
Smaller guest room maintaining brutalist style with raw concrete finishes and strategic placement according to local building norms.
Common bathroom for guests; simple layout ensuring privacy with minimal fixtures.
Dedicated private gym with robust design; includes space for weight training equipment and a functional area for cardio exercises.

openings.description: Large door with reinforced concrete frame ensuring security, aligned with Vastu principles by facing the auspicious east direction.
Strategically placed windows to maximize natural light while maintaining privacy and following local building codes.
East-facing window to invite positive energy as per Vastu guidelines, with sound insulation for privacy.
A concrete balcony extending from the living room, providing an outdoor space while respecting privacy boundaries.
